git.name: Understanding & Working with Git
git.description: Git is the the source code control system used for both commercial and Open Source projects. This is your first step in understanding how Git helps developers to manage their source code and how to make it part of your daily development workflow.

github.name: Understanding & Working with GitHub
github.description: As a leader in cloud-based Git systems it's important for web developers to understand its capabilities. In this course you'll learn how it is used not only to manage your team's source code, but also how it can help improve project management.

advancedgit.name: Advanced Git
advancedgit.description: To become a senior web developer you'll need to understand Git techniques and workflow processes that will make you an effective part of your team. As part of this you'll learn how to solve complex situations and problems using Git.

buildwebpages.name: Building Webpages
buildwebpages.description: Learn how to build simple webpages using HTML and CSS

beginnerjs.name: Beginning Javascript
beginnerjs.description: Learn the basics of the Javascript language

intermediatejs.name: Intermediate Javascript
intermediatejs.description: Gain insight into how Javascript handles datatypes and objects

advancedjs.name: Advanced Javascript
advancedjs.description: Acquire and indepth understanding of asynchronous operations and modern ES6 Javascript

p1xtprereqs.name: P1XT Guide: Prerequisites
p1xtprereqs.description: Maintaining your source code and publishing the body of work you create on an Open Source collaboration site are basic skills you'll need as a web developer. Complete this prerequisite before starting the four tiers of the P1XT Guide

p1xttier1.name: P1XT Guide: Tier 1 - Getting Started
p1xttier1.description: Prerequisite knowledge you will need before starting the courses that make up the four tiers of the P1XT Guide

p1xttier2.name: P1XT Guide: Tier 2 - Develop More Expertise
p1xttier2.description: Establish a solid foundational understanding of Javascript, HTML, and CSS

p1xttier3.name: P1XT Guide: Tier 3 - Add More Rigor
p1xttier3.description: Increase your knowledge by learning functional programming and webdev technologies and techniques.

p1xttier4.name: P1XT Guide: Tier 4 - Polish the Rough Edges
p1xttier4.description: Round out your knowledge by increasing your knowledge of advanced subjects like Artificial Intelligence, and put your knowledge to the test by completing advanced projects.

htmlbasics.name: HTML Basics
htmlbasics.description: Learn the basics of HTML - the standard used to define webpages.

cssbasics.name: CSS Basics
cssbasics.description: Learn the basics of CSS - the standard used to style webpages.

marryhtmlcss.name: Marrying HTML & CSS
marryhtmlcss.description: Learn how to combine HTML and CSS to create a professional webpage

intermediatehtml.name: Intermediate HTML
intermediatehtml.description: Improve your HTML knowledge with additional HTML programming techniques

intermediatecss.name: Intermediate CSS
intermediatecss.description: Improve your CSS knowledge with additional CSS programming techniques

advancedhtmlcss.name: Advanced HTML & CSS
advancedhtmlcss.description: Polish your HTML and CSS knowledge and skills with advanced techniques

introbootstrap.name: Introduction to Bootstrap
introbootstrap.description: Learn how to use the Bootstrap Library for styling

introfoundation.name: Introduction to Foundation
introfoundation.description: Learn how to use the Foundation Library for styling

introsass.name: Introduction to Sass
introsass.description: Learn how to use the Sass Library for styling

introless.name: Introduction to Less
introless.description: Learn how to use the Less Library for styling

introstylus.name: Introduction to Stylus
introstylus.description: Learn how to use the Stylus Library for styling

howwebworks.name: Learn How the Web Works
howwebworks.description: Learn How the Internet and World Wide Web Work

getstartedweb.name: Getting Started with the Web
getstartedweb.description: Learn how to set up a web project folder and file system for you projects
